page.title: 02HOUSING-FELL LANE to CENTRE
page.content: This area contains private{Housing} of all types - stone-built terrace housing up to and exceeding 100 years old, pre- and post-war semi-detached and detached houses. There is a also a large pre-war {council housing {estate.} There is only one {Industrial}site manufacturing paper tubes for the textile industry. Recreation facilities are almost absent, except for walking through the area's Holme House woods, to the N.E. of the area. There is only one new school in the area, Nessfield First School, built to serve the new housing estates established in the last 15 years.
